reference:
Map data was made available through the Ordnance Survey Open Data
initiative.  The data use the
National Grid coordinate system,
based upon eastings (x) and northings (y) instead of longitude and latitude.
title: London Borough Boundaries
description:
Description
This dataset contains the coordinates of the boundaries of all 32 boroughs
of the Greater London area.

parameters.x: The "easting" component of the coordinate, see details.
parameters.y: The "northing" component of the coordinate, see details.

format: A data frame with 45341 observations on the following 3 variables.
